TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeviceCodeCredential extends Azure.Core.TokenCredential

Docs.summary: A implementation which authenticates a user using the device code flow, and provides access tokens for that user account. For more information on the device code authentication flow see https://github.com/AzureAD/microsoft-authentication-library-for-dotnet/wiki/Device-Code-Flow.

MemberSignature.Value: public override Azure.Core.AccessToken GetToken (Azure.Core.TokenRequestContext requestContext, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = null);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype Azure.Core.AccessToken GetToken(valuetype Azure.Core.TokenRequestContext requestContext, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Docs.param: The details of the authentication request.
Docs.summary: Obtains a token for a user account, authenticating them through the device code authentication flow. This method is called by Azure SDK clients. It isn't intended for use in application code.
Docs.returns: An which can be used to authenticate service client calls.
